Text.valUnicode: Note that in order to post a message on accounts other than 'me' , the account must be your friend and approve the application

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset0 Microsoft Sans Serif;}{\f1\fnil\fcharset177 Microsoft Sans Serif;}} {\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;} {\*\generator Msftedit 5.41.21.2509;}\viewkind4\uc1\pard\ltrpar\cf1\f0\fs16 The authentication is done as defined at:\par http://developers.facebook.com/docs/authentication/desktop\par \par An empty application was defined in MSETEST FaceBook account.\par To create an application, simply go to:\par http://www.facebook.com/developers/apps.php\par \par The APP ID is taken from this application and it will be used for the authentication.\par The authentication is done using a .NET browser control which connects to FaceBook and get the access token back.\lang1037\f1\rtlch\par \lang1033\b\f0\ltrch\fs20\par }

Text.val: closes the window after document is complete (otherwise it opens a web browser)
